WHO WE ARE

Hello there! We are Elif and Phil.

Our dream is to create heaven on Earth. We do it by promoting a connected lifestyle to the source. We believe it is possible by connecting to ourselves, our community and nature on a deeper level. We take actions based on love, compassion and unity. We invite you to join our journey of healing ourselves, raising our frequencies and discovering our essences together.

This is the right place for you if you want to:
  • Connect deeply with yourself on spiritual and emotional level
  • Connect deeply with a community of highly intellectual and spiritual people
  • Raise your frequency through healing in a cozy safe space
  • Make the world a more conscious place
  • Receive lots of virtual hugs (and real hugs whenever it is possible)
